SELECT * FROM ( SELECT protask.*, ROWNUM rnum from ( SELECT proposed_task_id as propTaskId, proposed_task_name as propTaskName, proposed_task_desc as propTaskDesc, est_start_date as estStartDate, est_end_date as estEndDate, proposed_by as propBy, proposed_to as propTo, created_by as createdBy, updated_by as updatedBy, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate, task_id as taskId, proposal_status as propStatus FROM proposed_task WHERE 1=1
LOWER(proposed_task_name) LIKE LOWER( '%' || #searchValue# || '%' )
LOWER(proposed_to) LIKE LOWER( '%' || #searchValue# || '%' )
LOWER(proposal_status) LIKE LOWER( '%' || #searchValue# || '%' )
order by proposed_task_id ) protask where ROWNUM < = #end#) WHERE rnum > #begin#

SELECT proposed_task_id as propTaskId, proposed_task_name as propTaskName, proposed_task_desc as propTaskDesc, est_start_date as estStartDate, est_end_date as estEndDate, proposed_by as propBy, proposed_to as propTo, created_by as createdBy, update_by as updatedBy, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate, task_id as taskId, proposal_status as propStatus FROM proposed_task WHERE proposed_task_id = #propTaskId#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM proposed_task WHERE 1 = 1
LOWER(proposed_task_id) LIKE LOWER( '%' || #searchValue# || '%' )
LOWER(proposed_task_name) LIKE LOWER( '%' || #searchValue# || '%' )
